showerReviews.reviewText: We love the Y! Great classes, and excellent facility. Always warmly welcomed and very clean. People are always happy to answer questions. We love swim lessons and the outdoor pool too!

We are members of another Y (so "nationwide" members). Everytime we come to this location, they have new rules and different hoops for us to jump through to use the outdoor pool. It's frustrating how inconsistent it is, because the facilities are nice and the woman at the front desk is so sweet and helpful.

5/29/25 No better place to exercise. There is every piece of equipment you will need. Additionally the are three pools, two indoor, a lap pool and a "warm" pool and one (seasonal) outdoor pool.  This facility is always clean and well …

locations.title: Mason Community Center
locations.content: Mason Community Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … , kids center, rock wall and many other activities here. The ONLY downside is there are no towels for if you want to shower here.. it’s such a common amenity everywhere else, but for some reason not here.. would be 5 stars if they could …

The accessible changing rooms are always overcrowded and they took out the shower seats with no notice making the showers unusable with a disability. Kids run wild and unsupervised and a elementary aged child pooped in the pool last time I …
Beautiful facility with great staff. Lap pool was great and did NOT smell of chlorine. Bathroom and shower were very clean.
Nice swimming pool facilities and staffs. The only thing confuse me is the water temperature from the family changing room’s shower, just like the weather from Cincinnati:)
I got several times into a cold shower after work out.
